subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Jocelyn Thibault stopped 25 shots Wednesday night for his first shutout in more than three years and the Pittsburgh Penguins won their third game in a row, defeating the Devils, 3-0.
snippet: Jocelyn Thibault stopped 25 shots Wednesday night for his first shutout in more than three years and the Pittsburgh Penguins won their third game in a row, defeating the Devils, 3-0.
